column4: - that looks a great vpn server but i don;t think i was clear enough with my question - i'm looking for a vpn client
- a vpn client to connect to a PPTP vpn server, with a GUI

pptp is a failed protocol by design, it is not secure, do apt-cache search pptp and you will get some ideas but it is broken search for it and security http://www.schneier.com/paper-pptpv2.html that might be useful for you
